long_description: A lightweight, affordable tarp you can take to the campsite, sporting events and festivals, the Kelty Noah's Tarp 16 sets up quickly and offers plenty of shade to kick back with a few friends. Catenary cut, no-sag, coated polyester taffeta allows a very taut pitch; taped seams enhance weather protection. Versatile 4-point shape allows a multitude of pitch configurations. Grommets and reinforced nylon webbing pullouts allow the use of 2 extendable tarp poles, sold separately. Kelty Noah's Tarp 16 comes with stakes/guylines and a deluxe tote bag. Note: peak height varies based on pitch configuration and location.
short_description: A lightweight, affordable tarp you can take to the campsite, sporting events and festivals, the Kelty Noah's Tarp 16 sets up quickly and offers plenty of shade to kick back with a few friends.
